description:
These shoes are performance-primed for group rides, crits, or your next fondo. Built on a stiff carbon midsole, they efficiently transfer power through each stroke and dampen vibrations from the road, so your feet won't feel like they're on fire. The glove-like wrap design means no pressure points, less material and reduced weight.

  • Synthetic leather and mesh upper with a wrapping design for a low-profile, glove-like fit
  • Nylon midsole reinforced with carbon fibre absorbs vibration and provides stiff pedalling platform
  • Boa® L6 System closure with Velcro® toe strap holds your foot evenly and securely
  • Compatible with 3-bolt cleats with expanded cleat adjustment
  • Polyurethane outsole grips on pavement
name: Shimano RC502 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
